website_summaries.verdict: A great mask for those with acne-prone skin, but it's likely too harsh for others.
pros: This clay mask includes 10% sulfur, which helps clear up acne and prevent new breakouts
Great for cystic acne, and many notice a difference in their skin after one or two uses
cons: Too harsh for sensitive skin and for most to use as an overnight spot treatment

customer_reviews.title: Miracle mask
customer_reviews.text: This mask is unbelievable. I use it as a spot treatment over night and my pimples disappear in one or two days. I even use it on the ones that are about to appear so they never get to... I love it! I had tried it before because I received a sample from sephora and decided to buy the full size but found it here at a better price.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanna V.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this Now if You Want to Calm Your Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: Sunday Riley products are definitely an investment. However, this mask does amazing things to calm my uber sensitive oily forehead. I use it a couple of times a week to keep my skin blackhead free. I use all of Sunday Riley’s products for oily/sensitive skin and if I had to recommend just one product between UFO or Saturn...go with Saturn. It’s amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina P.

customer_reviews.title: Best mask ever
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually do product reviews, but I notice an instant difference in my skin, and particularly my acne whenever I use this product. I will say that if you have sensitive skin you might be looking to avoid this product. Seeing as how I don’t have particularly sensitive skin, and I felt a slight warming/almost burning sensation that can be a little intense. For those of you with normal skin though it’s a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Use it as a spot treatment
customer_reviews.text: Sulfur is really great at drying up acne, but also dries out the rest of your face. I’d recommend using it as a spot treatment. Unless you struggle with acne all over your. Also this goes on very thin. So it doesn’t feel like your wearing a mask. But it totally works, I had a few blemished that dried up overnight. Just make sure to use good moisturizer after using.
customer_reviews.author: tricia vignery

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve dealt with stubborn acne most of my life, including into my 30s. I’ve tried just about everything (truly) and this is the best spot treatment I’ve ever used. I’ve used it as a mask but prefer to use it overnight as a spot treatment. It absolutely prevents those stubborn blemishes from getting bigger. It won’t necessarily erase a blemish but it does seem to stop the progression of a new one. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Treats small and medium pimples overnight.
customer_reviews.text: This mask heeled my teenager son’s pimples overnight. He had a lot of them on his forehead, small size, but for long time. I put the thin layer of the mask as an overnight treatment and they all gone ( completely dried out) by the morning, Just little red spots left and the skin was a little red, but it it became normal by the next day. I did not expect so quick result!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Great mask
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the only masks I’ve purchased that I can visibly see a difference after I wear it. I have cystic acne which has been difficult to treat. Great for drying up acne and reducing blemishes.
customer_reviews.author: Randi Davis

customer_reviews.title: Too much tea tree in the sulfur
customer_reviews.text: The tea tree smell is too strong. Other than that it's ok.
customer_reviews.author: LaLo2556

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I so did not want to spend the money but i like this works amazing
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely amazing! I use it as an overnight mask as a spot treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: holy grail
customer_reviews.text: this stuff is amazing!! absolute game changer. even tried to switch to another sulfur mask that also had great reviews but it didn’t even come close to this stuff. smell is yuck as to be expected with a sulfur mask but it doesn’t take long at all to get used to it. i use it every night as a spot treatment. i’ll take a smelly mask and clear skin over anything!
customer_reviews.author: sammiam15

customer_reviews.title: Found love in a hopeless place!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in L❤️VE. I like it for a spot over night treatment the most. I get hormonal cystic acne once a month, and this helps old break outs heal, and prevent new ones. I was apprehensive about the $$ but It’s well worth it!! Nene disappointed with Sunday Riley
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Sunday Riley
customer_reviews.text: After many years of trial and error. I found most Riley products very effective. I am now make up free. Thanks to UFO. Luna and Good genes and Saturn mask. The product restore my youthful and natural glow.
customer_reviews.author: Roda Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Acne prone skin mask
customer_reviews.text: This is great for acne prone skin. Goes on heavy so use a brush
customer_reviews.author: atk

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product completely clears blemishes and calms irritation. It’s smells like sulfur but it works so well the smell doesn’t bother me
customer_reviews.author: Katie Faires

customer_reviews.title: Scent is unbearable
customer_reviews.text: I know this product works. My skin felt amazing after one use however the smell is so bad I have no choice but to return it. My face smells like gasoline and I’ve had a headache for two days now. It really is unbearable to continue use. Hopefully I can find something just as good without the stink
customer_reviews.author: Steph731
